name: bobmodules
title: Bob's Modules mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

Expansion to the Modules system.
Expands the 3 types of base game module to be 8 tiers, not just 3
Adjusts the bonuses each module gives, and allows you to customise them in mod settings.
Adds Pollution creating and Pollution cleaning modules, 8 tiers.
Adds Merged modules as follows:
  - Green modules offer combined Efficiency and Pollution cleaning bonuses, 8 tiers
  - Raw Speed module offers speed bonus with no negative effects, 8 tiers
  - Raw Productivity modules offer productivity bonus with no negative effects, 8 tiers
  - God modules offer all the bonuses with no negative effects, only 5 tiers.
All recipes are completely reworked, Makes use of electronic components from Bob's Electronics mod.
Research uses a unique Modules lab, and costs module parts to unlock module technology.

Although it can function as a stand alone mod, it is intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
